metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1843 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Open redirect vulnerability in the Access tracking mechanism in TYPO3 4.5.xbefore 4.5.24, 4.6.x before 4.6.17, 4.7.x before 4.7.9, and 6.0.x before6.0.3 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites andconduct phishing attacks via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1843` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-5
typo3-database - 4.5.19+dfsg1-5
typo3-dummy - 4.5.19+dfsg1-5
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.19+dfsg1-5').
